title: The Spaceport Company To Develop Commercial Sea Launch Pads
summary: The Spaceport Company, a startup founded by Tom Marotta, is proposing a solution to the increasing congestion at major launch sites: mobile launch pads that operate at sea.

title: SpaceX unveils next-gen Starlink V2 Mini satellites ahead of Monday launch
summary: SpaceX has released official specifications and photos of its next-generation Starlink V2 Mini satellites, which are set to launch for the first...

title: Startup developing sea-based launch pads
summary: A startup is proposing one solution to the increasing congestion at major launch sites: build mobile launch pads that operate at sea.

title: Unpiloted Soyuz spacecraft docks at space station to replace damaged crew capsule
summary: A replacement for a damaged Russian Soyuz crew ferry spacecraft docked at the International Space Station Saturday night, two days after launching from Kazakhstan on a mission to give two Russian cosmonauts and a NASA astronaut a ride back to Earth later this year.

title: SpaceX Crew Dragon poised for overnight launch to space station
summary: SpaceX is counting down to the deep overnight launch early Monday of a Falcon 9 rocket and Crew Dragon capsule carrying two NASA astronauts, a Russian cosmonaut and a history-making United Arab Emirates astronaut to the International Space Station.
